title.rendered: The Best iPhone Offers On Vodafone

content.rendered:
We’ve put together our best iPhone deals and offers for April 2018. Whether you’re looking for the mind blowing new iPhone X, a slightly older generation iPhone 8 or a budget iPhone 6 or SE, Fonehouse have got you covered!

Its been just over 10 years since the original iPhone came storming into the mobile phone market.
We’ve put together a list of the best iPhone deals to save you time searching around the web. Currently the best deals available are on EE and Vodafone.

So which iPhone is the one for you?

Most people will lean towards the latest new iPhone X but there are other things to consider. Firstly, the iPhone X is a very expensive handset but that’s expected with that level of technology. The iPhone 8 and 8 Plus are very good phones, but they didn’t improve much when comparing it to the iPhone 7. The iPhone SE comes with all the tech you need but the price tag is drastically lower.

Check out all our iPhone offers and deals here or browse through the list of our best deals for April 2018 below.

Our best Apple iPhone X Deals
Apple fans were online and buying the iPhone X the minute it was released. Without a doubt the iPhone X was the phone people were expecting but it comes with a hefty price tag.
iPhone X Specifications at a glance.

  • Runs on iOS 11
  • 5.8-Inch Screen Size
  • 1125 x 2436 Resolution
  • 3GB of Ram
  • Storage – 64GB or 256GB
  • Front Camera (selfie camera) – 7MP
  • Rear Camera – 12MP

Our 2 best iPhone X deals in April 2018.

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan
  • 16GB of Data
  • £10 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone X deal for only £59 a month.

  • £89 Upfront Cost
  • EE Essential Plan
  • 10 GB of Data
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone X deal for only £58 a month

Our best Apple iPhone 8 Deals
The iPhone 8 is a good phone and the best you can buy with a screen below 5 inches. The iPhone 8 can charge wirelessly and performs well under pressure when using multiple apps, spreadsheets and documents. It’s a perfect phone for someone looking for all the tech needed for day to day life, but the camera software is now outdated in comparison to the iPhone X and Samsung Galaxy S9 and S9 Plus.
iPhone 8 Specifications at a glance.

  • Runs on iOS 11
  • 4.7-Inch Screen Size
  • 750 x 1334 Resolution
  • 2GB of Ram
  • Storage – 64GB or 256GB
  • Front Camera (selfie camera) – 7MP
  • Rear Camera – 12MP

Our 2 best iPhone 8 deals in April 2018.

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan
  • 16GB of Data
  • £10 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 8 deal for only £43 a month

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • EE Essential Plan
  • 10GB of Data
  • £60 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 8 deal for only £43 a month

Our best Apple iPhone 7 Deals

The iPhone 7 only improved on the iPhone 6S a little. The camera improved slightly, the battery life has been improved a little and its partially waterproof. Whilst it is an upgrade from the 6S its not a huge lift on specifications which can make the iPhone 6S the more attractive handset due to price.

  • Runs on iOS 10
  • 4.7-Inch Screen Size
  • 750 x 1334 Resolution
  • 2GB of Ram
  • Storage – 32GB or 64GB or 256GB
  • Front Camera (selfie camera) – 7MP
  • Rear Camera – 12MP

Our 2 best iPhone 7 32GB deals in April 2018.

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan
  • 16GB of Data
  • £30 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 7 32GB deal for only £39 a month

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • EE Essential Plan
  • 20GB of Data
  • £30 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 7 32GB deal for only £39 a month

Our 2 best iPhone 7 128GB deals in April 2018.

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan
  • 16GB of Data
  • £10 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 7 128GB deal for only £43 a month

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • EE Essential Plan
  • 15GB of Data
  • £10 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 7 128GB deal for only £43 a month

Our best Apple iPhone 7 Plus Deals

The iPhone 7 Plus is a small improvement with a better camera, still waterproof but the design is typical of Apple.  You do get a bit more Ram and a slightly bigger screen.

  • Runs on iOS 10
  • 5.5-Inch Screen Size
  • 1920 x 1080 Resolution
  • 3GB of Ram
  • Storage – 32GB or 64GB or 256GB
  • Front Camera (selfie camera) – 7MP
  • Rear Camera – 12MP

Our 2 best iPhone 7 Plus 32GB deals in April 2018.

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan
  • 16GB of Data
  • £10 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 7 Plus 32GB deal for only £47 a month

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • EE Essential Plan
  • 15GB of Data
  • £50 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone 7 Plus 32GB deal for only £48 a month

Our best Apple iPhone SE Deals
The iPhone SE does break out of the usual iPhone drama. Usually we expect a newer phone to get bigger but…. They made it smaller. It’s perfectly designed for someone who doesn’t want a super large screen but still wants the technology.

  • Runs on iOS 9
  • 4-Inch Screen Size
  • 1136 x 640 Resolution
  • 2GB of Ram
  • Storage – 16GB or 32GB or 64GB
  • Front Camera (selfie camera) – 1.2MP
  • Rear Camera – 12MP

Our 2 best iPhone SE 32GB deals in April 2018.

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan
  • 16GB of Data
  • £70 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone SE 32GB deal for only £35 a month

  • £0 Upfront Cost
  • EE Essential Plan
  • 8GB of Data
  • £30 Cashback
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts

Get this iPhone SE 32GB deal for only £30 a month

Our April Sim Free iPhone Offers

  • iPhone X 64 GB Sim Free – £999.00
  • iPhone X 256GB Sim Free – £1149.00
  • iPhone 8 64GB Sim Free – £698.00
  • iPhone 8 256GB Sim Free –  £849.00
  • iPhone 8 Plus 64GB Sim Free – £789.00
  • iPhone 8 Plus 256GB Sim Free – £949.00
  • iPhone 7 32GB Sim Free – £529.00
  • iPhone 7 Plus 32GB Sim Free – £669.00
  • iPhone 7 128GB Sim Free – £649.00
  • iPhone 7 Plus 128GB Sim Free – £769.00

You can check out all our Sim free offers for April 2018 here.
Can’t find what you’re looking for? Just call our UK based customer service team on 0333 900 1133.
